passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that HTTP (port 80) access is restricted from the internet
code_block:
resource "azurerm_network_security_group" "bad_nsg" {
  name                = var.nsg_name
  location            = var.location
  resource_group_name = var.resource_group_name

  security_rule {
    name                       = "AllowAllInbound"
    priority                   = 100
    direction                  = "Inbound"
    access                     = "Allow"
    protocol                   = "Tcp"
    source_port_range          = "*"
    destination_port_range     = "22"
    source_address_prefix      = "0.0.0.0/0"
    destination_address_prefix = "*"
  }

  tags = var.tags

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure 'Trusted Microsoft Services' is enabled for Storage Account access
code_block:
resource "azurerm_storage_account" "this" {
  name                     = var.name
  resource_group_name      = var.resource_group_name
  location                 = var.location
  account_tier             = "Standard"
  account_replication_type = "LRS"

  allow_nested_items_to_be_public = true   # ❌ Checkov will flag this
  min_tls_version                 = "TLS1_0" # ❌ Weak TLS
}
